channel.title: Naffed up my run server -.-
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:133)[/code]
[b]Anybody help me? can't run server, just comes up with that.. [/b]

item.title: Naffed up my run server -.-
item.dc:creator: @God_Of_Love God Of Love
item.description:
@God_Of_Love wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:6, topic:264669”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=349471.msg2686366#msg2686366 date=1235693424]
Use tabs rather than spaces in your configuration files.
[/quote][/quote]

Ok ill try that.
Thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2009, 06:14:30 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Monkey wacko, post:7, topic:264669”]Jc got my back and helped me for you, now my name happens to be “god of love” on runefusion.net[/quote]

Well yeah thats on ‘runefusion.net’
This is moparscape forums, now bore off…

Read full topic

item.title: Naffed up my run server -.-
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

I use this for runserver
@echo off
color 0a
title Project Czar
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Works perfect for me

Read full topic
